column6: - Wolverine, Deadpool, Doctor Doom, Thanos: There's one hero that's beaten them all-and now she's got her own ongoing series! (Not that she's bragging.) - That's right, you asked for it, you got it, it's SQUIRREL GIRL! (She's also starting college this semester.) - It's the start of a brand-new series of adventures starring the nuttiest and most upbeat super hero in the world!
